subject: Re: Order #SSN5190 confirmed

conversations.body_text: Hello all,     I am starting to worry a bit with my order, since i don't have any shipping details to start with and with the fact that you didn''t repsond to my question as I would have to make a second order if the control box is not included in any of the products purchased as opposed to place a new order and send them all in one package     Best regards,  Nick Stav

Hi Nikos Stav,  I have received your message. Due to the holiday peak season, our response may be slightly delayed. It seems that the goods in the German warehouse have not yet arrived, which is why they were not shipped in time. However, they should arrive soon. Your order already includes the control box and motor bracket, so no separate purchase is necessary.

Thank you for your update.

Happy holidays and ho ho ho

Best Regards,

NS
